## Checklist

<!-- Check all items that apply. If unsure, leave unchecked and ask for help! -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the existing code style of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing

- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] I have tested the extension by installing from .vsix
- [ ] I have verified the extension works in a fresh VS Code window
- [ ] I have tested with multiple E2B sandboxes (if applicable)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation (README.md, CLAUDE.md, etc.) if needed
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md with my changes
- [ ] My code changes are self-explanatory or include inline comments

### Build & Package

- [ ] `bun run compile` runs successfully
- [ ] `bun run package` creates a valid .vsix file
- [ ] I have tested that .vscodeignore properly excludes dev files

### Version (for releases only)

- [ ] I have updated the version number in package.json
- [ ] The version follows semantic versioning (major.minor.patch)
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md with release notes
